title: Custom background issue.
comment: I love that you added this feature in, but there's just one problem with it: you didn't give the user the ability to crop the images so it would respect the screen's aspect ratio. Every live wallpaper that lets you choose a custom wallpaper should at least have this ability. It's a standard when it comes to applying wallpapers on Android, and I'm pretty disappointed that you chose to neglect this. :/

Just crop the images before adding it to the wallpaper.
You can use MS Paint on your PC to do that.
